prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a teenager woman with brown skin, curly hair, showing a clear sadness facial expression (sad expression), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, Rembrandt lighting, high dynamic range, 8k master
negative_prompt: low-res, blurry, deformed face, extra fingers, extra limbs, cropped head, over-saturated, watermark, text, logo, jpeg artifacts, disfigured, doll-like, unrealistic skin, severe shadow banding
